summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the evaluation of Seattle's vehicle impound program; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Washington Traffic Safety Commission for financial assistance in the amount of One Hundred Twelve Thousand Dollars ($112,000) to evaluate the deterrent effects of impounding vehicles driven by persons arrested for driving while license suspended; increasing the 2000 Budget of the Legislative Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
